query:
-- Estoque atual
SELECT 
  i.tenantId as estoque_tenant_id,
  t.name as estoque_dono,
  COUNT(*) as posicoes
FROM inventory i
LEFT JOIN tenants t ON i.tenantId = t.id
GROUP BY i.tenantId, t.name

UNION ALL

-- Cliente Hapvida
SELECT 
  id as estoque_tenant_id,
  CONCAT('CLIENTE: ', name) as estoque_dono,
  0 as posicoes
FROM tenants
WHERE name LIKE '%Hapvida%';
